attributes.action: Drop the charge agaist Michael Mancini for blowing his nose!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An Ayrshire businessman says he has been fined by the police for blowing his nose while driving.

Michael Mancini, from Prestwick, said he was sitting in stationary traffic with the handbrake on when he used a tissue to clean his nose. 

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/scotland/glasgow_and_west/8484978.stm

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
